<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 264</row>

**Perception** +19; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +19

</row>

**Items**
[Bag of Holding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249) (type II), [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [lesser healing potions](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (3), [_+1 morningstar_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8), _[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67)_ (20 bolts), 30 gp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 155

**Enraged Growth <actions string="Reaction" /> ([ <%TRAITS%127%%> polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) <%END>, [ <%TRAITS%134%%> primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134) <%END>, [ <%TRAITS%157%%> transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=309) **Trigger** The spriggan warlord takes damage <%END>) **Effect** The spriggan warlord grows to size Large, along with their equipment (which returns to natural size if removed). The spriggan warlord's reach increases by 5 feet. They regain 15 Hit Points and gain a +2 status bonus to melee attack and damage rolls. This effect continues until the end of the spriggan warlord's next turn, but on any turn in which the spriggan warlord deals damage to another creature and is not [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), the effect extends until the end of the following turn. When Enraged Growth ends, the spriggan warlord is fatigued for 1 hour.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_morningstar_ +16 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_crossbow_ +21 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d10+8 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 27
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28)
- **3rd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78)
- **4th**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279)

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Agai's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Warlord's Training**   A spriggan warlord has access to the critical specialization effects for [crossbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) and [morningstars](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8), and the reload of any crossbow they wield is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

</column>
